article_title: Expense Of Going Global Means Walgreens To Close 200 U.S. Stores

article_metadata.description: Amid its international growth plan to cut $1.5 billion in costs, Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA)new management team led by Italian billionaire Stefano Pessina said 200 U.S. stores would close amid the restructuring and integration of two iconic brands. Walgreens late last year completed its acquisition of European drug retailer Alliance Boots [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
